lead_paragraph: Dozens of American’s flights were delayed as an app for navigational documents malfunctioned. But it pointed to a coming issue of avionics security as airlines go paperless.

headline.print_headline: Several American Airlines Flights Are Delayed by an App Malfunction
headline.main: Several American Airlines Flights Are Delayed by an App Malfunction

snippet: Dozens of American’s flights were delayed as an app for navigational documents malfunctioned. But it pointed to a coming issue of avionics security as airlines go paperless.
abstract: American Airlines reports delay of dozens of flights when software installed in iPads used by pilots malfunctioned, making some electronic flight materials, including airport maps, unaccessible.
